short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dashboard extension for solopreneurs and makers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solopreneur Dashboard is a productivity-focused Chrome extension designed to help solopreneurs and makers stay organized and motivated. Features include a personalized daily focus, dynamic to-do list, inspirational quotes, and a Pomodoro timer with background music. The extension also provides easy access to valuable resources and a feedback form for continuous improvement.
